description.message: Screenshot tool with screen video recording. Take screen capture with further edit, screenshot. Free Screen Recorder. Powerful screenshot & screen capture tool, take full page screenshot, annotate your screenshot.

popupDesc1.message: Screenshot will open in a new tab after completion!

popupDesc2.message: Failed to take a screenshot! Try reloading the page.

popupDesc3.message: Cannot take a screenshot of this type due to Google Chrome policy. Try another page in your browser.

rateDialogDesc.message: هل تمانع في تقييمنا على سوق Chrome الإلكتروني؟ شكرا لك!
